What are the treatments for Mowat-Wilson syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of Mowat-Wilson syndrome:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Mowat-Wilson Syndrome  - Genetic Testing Registry: Mowat-Wilson syndrome  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Hirschsprung's Disease   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy  - Surgery and Rehabilitation
